content: made in vermont a bernie sanders inspired felted mitten pattern 100% of proceeds will go toward meals on wheels vermont a charity chosen by bernie sanders himself yarn i used álafosslopi by ístex1 in colors 0867 chocolate heather 0085 oatmeal heather 9973 wheat heather and 0051 white you may substitute for any other bulky weight yarn that is 100% wool and meets the correct gauge this pattern creates an oversized mitten that you will shrink down to the proper size by felting in the washing machine so you should avoid superwash wool yarn which is designed to not felt when washed size this is a one size mitten pattern that will fit most adult hands the mittens will be very oversized but once felted will shrink down the longer you leave the mittens to felt the smaller the mittens will become if you do not want to felt your mittens you may want to consider remove the waste yarn later to create what is called an afterthought playing with a smaller gauge/yarn/needles to achieve a smaller thumb mitten experiment to your heart s content for the left mitten on the next round 28 continue to knit in the main color oatmeal needles heather until you have 6 stitches left knit the last 6 stitches using some waste yarn pass these stitches back onto your left needle and i used us 10 6 00mm dpns for the whole pattern but you may knit back over them with the main color knit the body of the mitten using a circular needle continue to work row 29-49 of chart a gauge decreases 13 stitches = 4 in 10 cm with us 10 6 00mm round 1 in chocolate heather k2tog k4 a total of 6 times you should have 30 stitches left a note on fair isle round 2 work chart b until end of row if you have never done fair isle before read some tips and tricks round 3 there is no color work from this point on in chocolate here2 before you begin it will save you a lot of headache later heather k2tog k3 a total of 6 times you should have 24 stitches left pattern round 4 k to end in chocolate heather cast on 36 stitches i used long-tail cast-on3 round 5 k2tog k2 a total of 6 times 18 stitches left join in the round4 and place a marker at the beginning of the round round 6 k to end work in 1x1 rib k1 p1 for 4 row round 7 k2tog k1 a total of 6 times 12 stitches left work row 1-27 of chart a in stockinette all knit stitches round 8 k2tog a total of 6 times 6 stitches left for the right mitten cut yarn leaving a 6 tail to thread through the remaining 6 on the next round 28 knit the first 6 stitches using a bit of smooth stitches pull tight to close the top of the mitten waste yarn
